@slot.description: An icon to use in lieu of the default increment number stepper icon.
@slot.name: increment-number-stepper

@slot.description: An icon to use in lieu of the default decrement number stepper icon.
@slot.name: decrement-number-stepper

@event.description: Emitted if the numeric strategy allows autoClamp and the value is clamped to the min or max attribute.
@event.name: syn-clamp

@csspart.description: The container that wraps the number stepper.
@csspart.name: stepper

@csspart.description: The divider between the increment and decrement number stepper buttons.
@csspart.name: divider

@cssproperty.name: --syn-input-autofill-shadow
@cssproperty.description: The shadow to apply when the input is autofilled.

@cssproperty.name: --syn-input-autofill-readonly-shadow
@cssproperty.description: The shadow to apply when the input is readonly and autofilled.

@cssproperty.name: --syn-input-autofill-text-fill-color
@cssproperty.description: The text fill color to apply when the input is autofilled.

@cssproperty.name: --syn-input-autofill-caret-color
@cssproperty.description: The caret color to apply when the input is autofilled.
